name: Amunets Deco Collector - v0.1.51
description:
Mod-ID: 2365946321

A placeable that "collects" nearby decoration placeables and combines them into one.
Allow packing and unpacking of placeables on-the fly.

Improves server performance by reducing the number of individual placeable actors.
Improves client performance by using instanced static meshes for drawing.

To unpack all items, hold the Interact-Key (default E) on the 'ADC Placeable' object and select "unpack all".
To unpack indivudual items, holt the Interact-Key on the Object you want to unpack and choose "Interact".

This is supposed to work with any STATIC decoration item, however it uses a whitelist for now.

Does (currently) NOT support:
- skeletal meshes (like most flags)
- most stuff with specific interactions like doors, hatches, torches, instruments, traps etc.
- particles, lights etc.

Supports close to 13500 items from:
- Conan Exiles + DLCs
- Abyss - Modpack
- Abyss - Immersive Dekorationen (AID)
- AG - Architecture
- Age of Calamitous
- Ancient Civilization
- Arbre Decoration
- Arcadia - Fantasy Buildings and Decorations
- Askenderu Oriental Mod
- Asshuri Treasures
- Bertrams Servermod
- Beyond Decor
- Beyond Decor: Rustic Edition
- Cathedrals
- Coffre /Rangement /Decoration
- Crafty Counters
- Crucial Decorations
- Dark Desires
- Deco and Placeables

- Die Zuflucht Mod

- Jungle Building Set
- KDR unchained
- LBPR - Additional Features

- stone statues

changeNote:
2023-04-xx - Amunets Deco Collector v0.1.51
- add support for "Highmane's Arsenal".
- add support for "Happy Little Trees & more".
- add partial support for "VAM Legendary Lag Edition".
- add partial support for "VAM Safe Special Edition".
- added "replacement materials"-logic which (over time) will make even more stuff compatible.
author: LilMissHentai
